lfsom.layers.metrics

Class HexMapDistancer

  • java.lang.Object
    • lfsom.layers.metrics.HexMapDistancer

  • public class HexMapDistancer
extends java.lang.Object
    Implementation of distances for hexagonal maps.
    Author:
    vicente

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HexMapDistancer(int xSiz, int ySiz)
      By default, generates a HexMaxDistancer
      HexMapDistancer(int xSiz, int ySiz, boolean simple)
      Constructor gets size, and creates a class which contains a calculation of distances among cells.

      Returns a list of cells which belongs to a defined cluster
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer[]> listaCustom_display(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> listaC)
      Calculates adjacencies from a custom list of cells, to help show a bounding figure
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer[]> listaProximos_display(int id, int radio)
      Calculates a list of cells within a distance "radio" of one cell and their adjacencies
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer[]> listaSubnet_display(int id)
      Returns a list of cells which generate a subnet identified by "id" and calculates adjacencies

      Returns an array containing all the calculated distances

    • Constructor Detail

      • HexMapDistancer

        public HexMapDistancer(int xSiz,
               int ySiz,
               boolean simple)
        Constructor gets size, and creates a class which contains a calculation of distances among cells. If "simple" parameter is false, it also calculates the shared edges among cells, useful for visualization
        Parameters:
        xSiz -
        ySiz -
        simple -
